articles.title: These 8 Android apps have the Joker malware, you should delete them right now - HT Tech
articles.description: Joker malware is back to trouble Google again and security researchers have detected eight new apps on the Google Play Store that are laced with the virus. Time to delete these!
articles.content: The Joker malware is back to trouble Google. Researchers from Quick Heal Security Labs have detected eight apps that are on the Google Play Store that are laced with this Joker malware and we suggest… [+1944 chars]
